title: Apple macOS ImageIO EXR Parsing Integer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Apple macOS. Interaction with the ImageIO library is required to exploit this vulnerability but attack vectors may vary depending on the implementation.
The specific flaw exists within the ImageIO framework. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in an integer overflow before writing to memory. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT211293
timeline:
2020-05-28 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-08-05 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Mickey Jin of Trend Micro Mobile Security Research Team
